sentences.en: But it will start with the most explosive subject: the partially cleared minefield of race.

sentences.en: But the 21 st - century office can be a minefield for the amateur who enjoys a giggle.

sentences.en: Choosing the right school can be a bit of a minefield.

sentences.en: Eastwood's movie sidesteps the minefield by focusing on a single battle in the Pacific theater.
sentences.cn: 东木的电影巧妙地躲过了雷区,仅仅聚焦于太平洋战争中的一场战斗.

sentences.en: For institutions, these issues create a legal minefield.

sentences.en: He sprang from the minefield with surprising agility.

sentences.en: It is a minefield, as everyone has such strong feelings about it.

sentences.en: Singapore Airlines will be all too aware of the minefield that awaits.

sentences.en: Tax can be a minefield for the unwary.
